about_the_game:
NOW UPDATED TO VERSION 1.0

Welcome to Subverse: The science fiction roleplaying experience developed for the discerning adult by a team of filthy apex perverts.


MORE SMUT THAN EVER

No still CG bullshit here, it’s all animated and it’s all voiced! The experienced cocksmiths at StudioFOW bring you over 239 different unlockable sex scenes that you can mix and match to your heart’s content. On top of that there’s more than 40 minutes of cinematic porn added in version 1.0 to enjoy as your reward for completing your crew’s devotion quests.

Sex scenes include a wide variety of tastes such as:

Male on Female, Female on Female, Futa on Female, Xeno on Female, Solo, Toys, Orgies and even Gangbangs!

Love our VA’s and can’t get enough? Receive intimate audiotapes from your girls as you gain their loyalty and respect!

Want to be your very own porn baron? Use Killi’s Gallery to set up your own poses and perfect your photography skills with a variety of unlockable backgrounds!

ROGUE’S GALLERY OF BADASS BABES

There are no good girls in Subverse. These are the baddest babes in the Prodigium galaxy, complete with exceptional combat potential and drop-dead gorgeous looks. With 9 charming characters to recruit, romance and rail there’s something for everyone!

Fight alongside them in space combat missions or deploy them on the ground to wreak havoc on the tyrannical Imperium.

Gain their admiration over the course of your 30+ hour adventure and unlock new “devotion” quests close to their hearts.

Equip them with sexy outfits and customize their looks.

CINEMATIC STORYTELLING

Experience a fully-voiced, galaxy-spanning space opera full of surreal moments. Told via a combination of our dynamic story system, hours of pre-rendered cinematics and even some flashback slides – the main quest can easily take you 20 hours to complete.

In addition to the main storyline, you can spend even more time on side-gigs and building up your force of insurgents to destabilize the Imperium’s grip on the populace.

The real engine of the revolution is the mysterious hacker known as Fortune, who helps you uncover a galactic conspiracy as you expand your dossier of commanders and save their planets.

ACTUAL GAMEPLAY

What the fuck? Gameplay in my porn? Yes! For those that are just here for ass and titties, there are skip options to get to the good stuff as well.

Watch your flagship, the Mary Celeste, evolve throughout the game as you find upgrades and complete planet events.

The heart of the ship is your BFF android DEMI, who grows alongside you and bestows passive bonuses on all your crewmates.

Science Officer Dr. Lily mutates bio-mechanical soldiers in her lab, so you can deploy them on the ground to aid the revolution.

As you accumulate even more resources for the revolution, spend them on upgrading your starfighter to engage in intense , retro SHMUP-style action.

With over 20 unique boss fights in the game, there’s always a challenge to be found just around the corner.


FEATURES LIST

  • Overhauled leveling and progression system

  • 239 lewd sex scenes, all mix-and-matchable via our Pandora system

  • 9 uniquely charming waifus to recruit, romance and rail all with complex backstories and individual quests

  • 40 minutes of pre-rendered sex cinematics directed by StudioFOW

  • Dynamic narrative system drives the 20+ hour fully voiced story forward

  • Customization options for hair color, sweat,  lewd body art and Captain’s skin

  • Special outfits to unlock that are usable in Pandora

  • NO AI SHIT – Everything in this game was lovingly crafted, performed and programmed by a team of passionate individuals

  • No Pay2Win, no Gacha, and not a single lootbox in sight!

  • A pulsating 60+ track smorgasbord of chillstep, synthwave, and metal tunes with jukebox functionality

  • Gallery photo feature with pose-able waifus

  • Hundreds of collectibles including rare behind-the-scenes content

  • Over 40 audiotapes to collect, totaling to almost 2 hours, each providing a unique sexy encounter performed by the VA’s

  • 5 different enemy factions to fight in space and ground combat

  • 20+ unique boss fights

  • 13 unique mantics to breed and fight with

  • Explore more than 400 planets designed by our Kickstarter backers

  • Over 2 hours and 30 minutes of story cutscenes, all animated by StudioFOW

content_descriptors.notes:
SUBVERSE contains fully 3D-animated, explicit sex scenes hand-crafted by a team of degenerate neckbeards. Please be warned that a standing crew of gorgeous women are ready to bring your fetishes to life, and that all scenes are accompanied by pleasure-filled lewd moans performed by highly talented voice actresses. 

There is also cuddling in this game. If such lewd acts are offensive to you then you should avoid installing this game at all costs. Seriously, don't do it.

name: Subverse

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel i5 7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 570 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel i9 9900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6700 / Nvidia GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
